title: FS: T206 UZIT, Lenox, and Broadleaf 350 All Sold, Thanks
author: edjs

posts.post_title: FS: T206 UZIT, Lenox, and Broadleaf 350 All Sold, Thanks
posts.post_content:
Hi guys, I'm looking to sell some of my tough backs. I accept  PayPal for these.  Prices are net to me, so please add 3%  for regular  PayPal. Shipping is on me.  Scans available on  request.

Manning, UZIT, PSA A- [strike]$1400[/strike]sold
Seymour Portrait, Lenox, PSA 2- [strike]$1100[/strike]sold
Slagle, Broadleaf 360, SGC 30- [strike]$850[/strike]sold



PM, or e-mail with questions, a firm "I'll take it" will out do ongoing  negotiations.  Thanks for looking.
